thread.section_title: Kimpton Hotel Eventi - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Customer Service - Above and beyond!
thread.title_full: Excellent Customer Service - Above and beyond! - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kristi J
title: Excellent Customer Service - Above and beyond!
text:
My girlfriend and her boyfriend stayed here at the Eventi over St. Patrick's Day weekend for his birthday. I wanted to send something to his room to surprise him on his special day. I called and Dominque went above and beyond to help me. I have never had a hotel employee be so kind and accommodating. She went and got balloons and his favorite vodka and created a cool little set up. He was over the moon and so surprised. She even sent me a picture when it was all done.
My girlfriend said that this was the way they were treated the whole time and that she would never stay anywhere but the Eventi when they went to New York. We are looking to book again in the next 3 months
Thank you so much! Love from Texas!!!
